name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Master Quest
overview: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Master Quest is a reworked version of the original Ocarina of Time for the Nintendo 64. Master Quest contains largely the same content as the original Ocarina of Time, but with redesigned, more difficult dungeons akin to a Second Quest. This game is an unofficial port from the original GameCube version.
